com.tngtech.configbuilder

Class ConfigBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tngtech.configbuilder.ConfigBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the config class which shall be instantiated.

    public class ConfigBuilder<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a config object. ConfigBuilder instantiates a class and sets fields of the instance by parsing annotations and loading values from properties files or the command line. It validates the instance by parsing JSR303 constraint annotations.

    Fields of the config class can have the following annotations:
    DefaultValue
    PropertyValue
    CommandLineValue
    SystemPropertyValue
    EnvironmentVariableValue
    ValueTransformer
    LoadingOrder

    Properties files are loaded with a PropertyLoader using its default config. In order to change settings for the PropertyLoader, the config class may be annotated with
    PropertiesFiles
    PropertyLocations
    PropertySuffixes
    PropertyExtension

    To specify a global order for parsing ValueExtractorAnnotation annotations, annotate the class with
    LoadingOrder

    To specify your own error messages file (which is loaded by the PropertyLoader with the same settings as other the properties files), annotate the class with
    ErrorMessageFile

    Version:
    0.1-SNAPSHOT
    Author:
    Matthias Bollwein

    • Method Detail

      • withCommandLineArgs

        public ConfigBuilder<T> withCommandLineArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
        Sets the command line arguments that the ConfigBuilder uses in order to parse fields annotated with @CommandLineValue. Command line arguments must match the options specified in the @CommandLineValue annotations.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
        Returns:
        the instance of ConfigBuilder

      • overridePropertiesFiles

        public ConfigBuilder<T> overridePropertiesFiles(java.util.List<java.lang.String> baseNames)

      • printCommandLineHelp

        public void printCommandLineHelp()

      • build

        public T build(java.lang.Object... objects)
        Gets an instance of the config, sets the fields and validates them. The method sets up the configuration by loading properties and parsing command line arguments, then tries to find a constructor of the config class that matches the arguments passed to it, instantiates the config class, sets its fields and validates the instance.
        Parameters:
        objects - a vararg of Objects passed to a corresponding constructor of the config class.
        Returns:
        An instance of the config class.

      • merge

        public T merge(T instanceOfConfigClass)
